Sports.name: Hiking
Sports.description: Long walks on natural trails such as mountains, forests, or hills to enjoy scenic views and fresh air.
Sports.benefits: Improves overall fitness, reduces stress, strengthens leg and heart muscles, and fosters a deeper connection with nature.
Sports.equipment: Comfortable hiking shoes, backpack, water, and trail map.

Sports.name: Trail Running
Sports.description: Running on uneven natural paths like forests or mountains for greater challenge compared to urban running.
Sports.benefits: Increases endurance, burns high calories, improves balance and body coordination, and provides a peaceful nature experience.
Sports.equipment: Trail-specific running shoes, athletic clothing, and water bottle.

Sports.name: Rock Climbing
Sports.description: Ascending natural rock faces using hands and feet for both physical and mental challenges.
Sports.benefits: Strengthens full-body muscles, boosts focus and self-confidence, and delivers excitement in a natural environment.
Sports.equipment: Rope, harness, helmet, and climbing shoes.

Sports.name: Kayaking
Sports.description: Paddling a small boat on rivers or natural lakes to explore blue-water nature.
Sports.benefits: Works upper-body muscles, aids weight loss, promotes mental relaxation, and allows close observation of wildlife.
Sports.equipment: Kayak, paddle, life jacket, and waterproof clothing.

Sports.name: Mountain Biking
Sports.description: Cycling on rugged mountain trails for speed and adventure in the wilderness.
Sports.benefits: Enhances cardiovascular system, strengthens legs, reduces depression, and offers enjoyment of stunning natural landscapes.
Sports.equipment: Mountain bike, helmet, gloves, and basic repair tools.
